name: PHProjectTextElement
desc: An element that represents text within project section content.

items.name: var text: String
items.desc: The raw unformatted string for the text element.

items.name: var attributedText: NSAttributedString?
items.desc: The stylized attributed string for the text element as presented to the user in Photos.

items.name: var textElementType: PHProjectTextElement.ElementType
items.desc: The enumerated type of the text element.

items.name: enum PHProjectTextElement.ElementType
items.desc: An enumeration of the type of text element.
